scripts.init: npm run init:react && npm run init:wc
scripts.build: npm run build:wc && npm run build:react
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm run pub:wc && npm run pub:react
scripts.version: npm run bump:wc & npm run bump:react
scripts.postversion: git switch -c $npm_package_version & git add package.json wc/package.json wc/package-lock.json react/package.json react/package-lock.json && git commit -m "Bump versions to $npm_package_version" && git push --set-upstream origin $npm_package_version && gh pr create -f && npm run pub
